London_Registered_Office.Title: London Service Address
London_Registered_Office.Author: Sobiya Ameen
London_Registered_Office.Banner_Content: You may enhance the prestige of your business with our prestigious London service address. Our team of experts makes your dream process become a reality in a seamless and easy possible way.

What_is_a_Registered_Office_Address.Title: What is a Service Address?
What_is_a_Registered_Office_Address.Description: The official communication address for a specific corporate director, limited liability partner (LLP) member, secretary, or someone with substantial control (such as a shareholder holding more than 25% of the company's shares) is known as their service address. They will get their official government mail there. Legal requirements call for a service address, and public records disclose this information. Except for PO Box Numbers, any complete postal address in the UK or overseas may be used as a service address. While a residential address is permitted, most people choose an alternate service address to preserve their privacy.

Services.Title: Registered Office Address

How_to_get_your_London_registered_Office.Title: How is the Service Address different from a Registered Office Address?
Steps: Anyone can view your registration address and service address through Companies House, as they are both publicly accessible. For this reason, a lot of people are hesitant to give their residential or business address.
Alternatively, you can use a third-party address to prevent individuals searching for your company from finding your residence or from sending you a ton of spam emails.
We extend to you the option of using our distinguished London address for both your service and registered office as there are advantages to doing this such as:
There is a significant distinction between a registered and service address, as you can see. If you mix them up, your address can become publicly known.

Services.question: What is meant by service address?
Services.answer: The official contact address of an LLP member, subscriber, director, secretary, or Person with Significant Control (PSC) is called a service address. When any of these people join a firm during or after its establishment, they are legally obligated to furnish service addresses for the public record.

Services.question: What is a director service address in London?
Services.answer: A director of a company based in the United Kingdom must give an address to which they can personally receive documents from Companies House and HMRC. For this purpose, you may use your residential address, but it will be visible to the public.

Services.question: How much does a London Service Address cost?
Services.answer: The annual fee of the London Service Address is £26.00 plus VAT for each additional year which might vary as per certain circumstances.

Services.question: Can the service address be used for general mail forwarding?
Services.answer: No, individual business officers may only utilize our London Service Address to receive and forward statutory correspondence. This service cannot be used to receive or forward general mail. For general mail reasons, we do provide a Business Address service that may be purchased separately for £96.00 per year.
